snippet.title: DESORDRE - First Gameplay : Traveling Through Dimensions & Portals #UnrealEngine5
snippet.description:
DESORDRE is a first-person puzzle game inspired by the portal series but here each puzzle need to be solved by traveling through two timelines of the same room. You are helped by your portal gun and the possibility to slow down the time.

The game is made by one person.

DESORDRE : A Puzzle Game Adventure on steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2097490/DESORDRE__A_Puzzle_Game_Adventure/

Twitter : https://twitter.com/shkinteractive

#desordre #desordregameplay #unrealengine5 #UE5
